Package com.java.simonsobstaclecourse.model.player

Class Players

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
java.util.AbstractList<E>
java.util.ArrayList<Player>
com.java.simonsobstaclecourse.model.player.Players
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Player>, Collection<Player>, List<Player>, RandomAccess
public class Players extends ArrayList<Player>
Representing a collection of players in the game. Extends the ArrayList class to provide additional functionality for managing players.
Author:
Abhishek Wadmare, Lakshay Narula
